__e: These are not people we're dealing with, but animals.
She said, "They're not boys, they're savages."
Now you're at the mercy of the fishes and wild beasts... you, who bragged about your warrior innocence.

Because, you pathetically ineffectual... and pusillanimous pretend friend to animals, I'll tell you why. Because when I had anything to do with her sixyears ago... there was no such thing, I hadn't thought ofityet.
This stuff'll make you a goddamn sexual tyrannosaurus, just like me.
We'd be fools to let happiness pass us by.
That's what I like to see, devils and beasts going for each other's throats.
I saw animals that don't belong neither here or in Texas
It's a thousand head of my steers, dying for feed and water.
No...no more thank you... Lovely to have seen you all but I have some other animals to call on!
Hello. we're here. and we got our 200 head just outside of town.
Tom, some of those cows in there are mine.
I'll see to watering the stock and bedding them down.
Well, unfortunately, livestock and machinery don't make a good farm.
Well, maybe we're all fools and none of it matters.
- Yeah. Anyone big enough to frighten me, stupid enough to try.
While I have never been a big fan of the women you date, I will say that at least they were too stupid to be harmful.
If your parents are too fucked-up to do it, then maybe I should.
